{{Description|You and Paimon studied the sounds of plants that sprout after the rain.}}
'''Surgent Manifestation''' is [[Traveler (Dendro)]]'s [[Elemental Burst]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* The Lea Lotus Lamp in its original state or after Hydro transformation attacks every '''1.5''' seconds, resulting in a total of '''8''' hits.
* The Lea Lotus Lamp after Electro transformation attacks every '''0.9''' seconds, resulting in a total of '''13''' hits.
* The Lea Lotus Lamp carries '''0.4''' [[gauge unit]]s of {{Dendro}} while in its normal state. Applying {{Hydro}} to it will trigger [[Bloom]] and produce a Dendro Core.

;<big>Constellation Effects</big>
* {{Talent Note|constellation|2|Green Resilience}}
** The Lea Lotus Lamp's duration is increased to '''15''' seconds.
** The Lea Lotus Lamp in its original state or after {{Hydro}} transformation now hit the enemies a total of '''10''' times.
** The Lea Lotus Lamp after {{Electro}} transformation now hit the enemies a total of '''16''' times.
* {{Talent Note|constellation|4|Treacle Grass}}
* {{Talent Note|constellation|6|Withering Aggregation}}
